original_text: No one looked on you with pity or had compassion enough to do any of these things for you. Rather, you were thrown out into the open field, for on the day you were born you were despised.
korean_text: 아무도 너를 돌보아 이 중에 한 가지라도 네게 행하여 너를 불쌍히 여긴 자가 없었으므로 네가 나던 날에 네 몸이 천하게 여겨져 네가 들에 버려졌느니라

sentences.original_text: No one looked on you with pity
to do any of these things for you
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 위해 이런 일들 중 어떤 것도 하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: for on the day you were born
